mapper.select: SELECT M.MSGID,M.to_id,M.from_id,M.title,M.content,m.time,m.hit, TO_EMP.NAME AS TO_NAME, TO_EMP.POSITION AS TO_POSITION, TO_EMP.DNAME AS TO_DNAME, TO_EMP.PROFILEIMAGE as To_PROFILEIMAGE, TO_EMP.EMAIL AS TO_EMAIL, FROM_EMP.NAME AS FROM_NAME, FROM_EMP.POSITION AS FROM_POSITION, FROM_EMP.DNAME AS FROM_DNAME, from_emp.profileimage AS FROM_PROFILEIMAGE, FROM_EMP.EMAIL AS FROM_EMAIL, FROM_EMP.PHONE as FROM_PHONE, FROM_EMP.STATUS AS FROM_STATUS, FROM_EMP.HIREDATE AS FROM_HIREDATE FROM MSG M JOIN EMP TO_EMP ON M.TO_ID = TO_EMP.EMPNO JOIN EMP FROM_EMP ON M.FROM_ID = FROM_EMP.EMPNO where m.to_id = #{empno} ORDER BY M.MSGID DESC
